missingVerse.description: Verse {{verse}} is missing from chapter {{chapter}}. Insert the missing verse to fix.
missingVerse.moreInfo: A chapter should contain verse markers for all verses. This may be a typo or a missing verse. Please insert the missing verse to fix this issue.

verseOutOfOrder.description: Verse {{verse}} occurs out of order in chapter {{chapter}}.
verseOutOfOrder.moreInfo: Verses should occur in ascending order in a chapter. Please move the verse marker to the correct location to fix this issue.
